name: VACCINE SIMULATOR
description:
VACCINE SIMULATOR

Earth is suffering from another pandemic. Thousands of people are dying everyday. Governments are at the edge of collapsion as extreme precautions are not being effective. Nothing can stop these vile creatures. Fortunately, a new vaccine developed by the best scientists on earth has a chance to give humanity a second chance. Will you be able to defend the test subject's body from these relentless enemies and put an end to this devouring pandemic?

Hey everyone! Vaccine Simulator is the first game we have ever developed, and we are aware of the fact that it's playtime is quite short and some levels are hard to beat. Nevertheless we believe that the game is had to be released.  With this release, we are looking forward to make the game better with your help. Depending on comments and reviews, we will be adding new features, levels and viruses to the game. So you may enjoy the game even more. For now, please enjoy the beta version of Vaccine Simulator, and please help us to make it better by giving us constructive opinions. Thanks a lot, and ENJOY!
